img_text: en.wikipedia.org Field Marshal Arthur Wellesley, 1st Duke of Wellington, KG, GCB, GCH, PC, FRS (1 May 1769-14 September 1852) was a soldier and statesman. He was one of the leading military and political figures of 19th-century Britain. Wellesley was born in Dublin into a wealthy Anglo-lrish aristocratic protestant family.
